contentList.content: You are a failure of all magical arts, you have done nothing to improve your skills with a sword. But you kept trying even when time and time again you failed you never gave up. then one day a group of neighboring bandits decided to pillage your village, you fell at the first sign of struggle barely putting up a fight. In your last breaths gasping for air you herd a whisper... a voice of darkness from a distant place far from your own "i CaN GIvE yOu wHAt YoU SeEk" and instantly you gave in giving more and more of your self to this.. presence until there was nothing left yet it kept taking and taking past the point of anything left to take, it reviled all to you and you wish you hadn't taken its offer and yet you seem far more powerful then the rest but at what cost. you stand back up an insatiable hunger in your mind and heart...

Harnesser of the deepest shadows, the Phantom Strider wields darkness with unparalleled mastery. They drown themselves in obscurity, and fully give into to hungry nature allowing them unleash devastating necrotic power. The Phantom embraces the distortion of the darkness, casting demonic spells and enfeebling their adversaries.

Shattering beyond the boundary of dimension into light side of the Void through extreme thought of willpower in their dying moments. The Fate Spinner sat in a liminal space for what seemed like an eternity, flooded by all of the knowledge of multiple universes. Then one day they opened their eyes awake in a world they unsure is their own ready to fill it with their new found unlight.

When a person is murdered in an extremely violent fashion they often end up in the shadowfell doomed to wander for eternity, when a soul truly resists this process making the very space and time warp around them. From the stress of a opposing forces dimension tears and the soul drops on the edge of the Void directly in the vortex that separates the light side of the void from the dark. Their body becomes filled with the energies both, slowly mastering the affects of time and space until they learn a way to return and make the world quake with the Void's influence.

The outer clans tell tale of a blade once held by an archangel said to have the ability to devour the soul of its target; its pulses with power, and glowed of unlight, its blade was lined with alien runes from a divine realm. Thus it became the requiem that all hear when drawn.
Requiem was left deep within the Void slowly absorbing its caustic unlight. Evil creatures also suffer extra physic damage.

Requiem grows more powerful with its user, unlocks skills of those it has consumed in the past. The melee attack stat is always the highest stat of its wielder."It always sent a shutter down my spine when the old one drew his blade... Why? one asks... because i knew someone was about to die..."
When you land a critical hit or kill a target with a melee attack gain another attack.
Using the souls trapped inside the sword force them to possess undead creatures in the area making them become your allies.(don't use on kethric breaks him)

Tear a rift open on your location for a moment dealing caustic unlight damage and making you ripple in space and time. Evil creatures recognize your sword and become terrified of you."deep in that darkness, long i stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal dared to dream ever before."
Requiem's blade separates into a thousand tiny, slender blade fragments, which fly away from the sword in a cloudlike formation.
Take an aggressive stance before unleashing a flurry of 4 blows.(note this spell only works with an offhand and main hand equipped)
Slam your blade into the ground transferring many shards of Requiem along the ground before erupting them into weapons.

Summon the soul of the legendary blacksmith from the clan Stormraven and wield one of her most cherished creations."Never again may i rest. Never again may i sit back in silence as one comes before, No they will stand in silence as i ravage their allies stricken with fear."
A sword made from the Legendary assassin clan Stormraven it is unknown how the soul of the blacksmith ended up in Requiem it was believed she died a peaceful life.
Your strike has caused kinetic energy to build within the target causing a delayed explosion.

Using Requiem Summon the soul of the Curse Breaker within the blade and wield its power in the form of their signature weapon."To something as old and infinite as me the concept of one does'nt seem to make sense anymore." he exclaimed before cleaving the seemingly unbreakable curse on the boy in two.
The blunt blade said to break any magical construction, despite its massive size it feels strangely light and a hum can be herd coming from it.

Using Requiem Summon the soul of MewMew in the form of an unbreakable hammer, infused with the power of a God of thunder."The old one was not known for his understanding and tolerance, he was well known for his cruelty and wrath."
A legendary Hammer once thrown to quell another universe's world snake. the owner was felled by a redeemed God of War and the soul collected within Valhalla.
Throw this legendary weapon causing a massive explosion.
Call apon a long forgotten love to embrace you handing you the perfect weapon for desires of the heart."I've seen kingdoms across dimensions crumble, what hope do you think you have?"
A dagger with gnarly serrations the thought of cutting yourself on them is oddly comforting.

Focus your fury into your blade and call upon a forgotten faithful ally."When they felt her raw power all shuttered and collapsed at my feet burned, Loosing all semblance of any strength left in their bodies."

A glaive with a phoenix feather inlaid it once was used to quell an uprising in a legendary nation of voidborne. Its said that the more the blade is swung he hotter it becomes, much like its former owner it thrives off of an arrogant fighting style.
Anytime fire damage is delt gain resistance to fire.
A robe that was left forgotten in the Void only to be found by the Voidborne.
Teleport to an enemy and deal damage with your Fists and inflict additional radiant and necrotic damage upon impact
Teleport to an enemy and deal damage with your main melee weapon and inflict additional radiant and necrotic damage upon impact.
Mastering your manipulation of darkness, cause minor tears into reality after teleporting leaking unnatural darkness into the area.
Upon killing a target use the last moments of its lifeforce to slip into the dark side of the Void making you invisible as you flicker between dimensions.
Fade partially into the Void making harder to see you.
your mastery over colliding forces allows you slip in and out of existence with ease giving you a unparalleled presence on the battlefield. Of course casting this way has unpredictable effects.
Gather and convert mass amounts of darkness into unlight powering your body to the point that your speed becomes supersonic for a moment.
Conjure a ball of pure darkness then twist it into unlight before unleashing upon your opponent.Generates Loss Remnants
Tear open a very small hole in dimension allowing Unnatural darkness to pour through.
Rip open a larger hole allowing alot of darkness to come rushing through.
Gather natural light then begin to infect it with the aberrant darkness of the Void until it erupts into a stream of necrotic power.Generates Loss Remnants
An imaginary substance left behind from your disgust with your opponent's weakness. Used to cast specific spells..
Your able to sense your own manifestation of disgust allowing you to channel it into a more advanced attack.
Condense all of your hate, anger, and suffering in a single blast, steals your opponents willpower.
Wrap light over and over around the target until it begins to spiral devastating the area.Causes a minor rift in dimension sapping the target weakening them
This target has been devastated by the overwhelming power of twining light. has Disadvantage on attack rolls and all abilities.
Target suffers from 50% reduction in movement speed, disadvantage on attack rolls and all ability checks.
Focus a loss remnant onto a single point in space over shooting it. Causing a rip in space and time to the Void, Raining Chaotic energies down onto your target
You learn to lash dimension causing a distortion to occur when casting spells, adding force damage, based on your WisdomModifier+5.
Teleport to 3 targets and strike them with lashing shadows draining their youth and weakening their attacks.
Surging with fury you grasp tightly onto all of the light in the area condensing it into a miniature nova before pointing it into a direction.Causes a massive explosion of light and cold damage
Giving into your paranoia has made you excessively prepare against your target, offering advantage on all saving throws,attack throws, and power you with necrotic power.

Fighting such a difficult opponent has made you overjoyed into madness, your opponents shudder as they hear your sickening laughter form being stabbed by their weapons.Gain resistance to Slashing and Bludgeoning damage along with a shield.
Charge up a burst of power filling you and your allies with conflicting emotions to power your teams fighting style.
Combine one Loss Remnant with two Void Weave to form one Emptyness Plasma.
Strengthen your connection to the great indifference allowing you to constantly hear it whispering in your ear feeding you fractured knowledge granting a bonus on wisdom rolls.

Whenever you cast a spell on a creature, you can push or pull the target 2m away from you or towards you if the target is friendly, the spell hits it with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, or it fails a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against the spell.

Whenever you cast a spell on a creature, you can push the target 2m away from you if the target is friendly, the spell hits it with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, or it fails a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against the spell.

Whenever you cast a spell on a creature, you can pull the target 2m towards you if the target is friendly, the spell hits it with an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, or if it fails a <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against the spell.

When an ally within [1] of you hits with a weapon attack, you can use your Reaction to mentally connect with the ally. able to look through theith eyes summon many energy daggers to strike their target all at once and deal 1d10 Piercing damage.

You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier, and you share these charges with Binding Surge: Fall Damage.
Alter the effect of gravity on a target by increasing or decreasing the magnetism of the targets atoms for up to 1 minute or until your concentration ends.

Infuse Void energy into a target causing a magnetism-like effect forcing them to seem heavier.

A creature's Movement Speed is reduced by [1], and it has Advantage on Strength Checks and Strength Saving Throws.

Force a repelling effect on the targets atoms, greatly reducing its weight.

A creature's Movement Speed increases by [1], it can Jump twice as far as normal, and it has Disadvantage on Strength Checks and Strength Saving Throws.
The Voidborne is emitting a powerful vortex of energy.

Whenever an affected creature starts its turn within the aura, it takes [1] on a failed save and its <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is reduced to [2] until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage, and moving costs twice as much movement.
The number of times you can use either <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_BindingSurgeAttack">Binding Surge: Attack</LSTag>Replenishes on a <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
The number of times you can cast the Once Per Rest version of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_EventHorizon_OncePerRest">Infinity Gate</LSTag>.
The number of times you can use either Binding Surge: Attack You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Voidborne are disconnected from mystera and require relearning how to feel the weave. their spells are powered by the Void's corrupting touch taking the weave around them and making it "Voided"
A resource made from ones sheer feeling of emptiness and a desire of worth.
The result of infinite Negative energy being forced into infinite Positive energy, forming a sense of nonexistence able to take the shape of any energy.

Open a gate to your personal reality. Manifesting a power unique to you, causing targets in your vicinity to feel eternity. while caught in your infinity gate they are ripped appart by a vortex of power.deals force damage each turn and holds targets in place that fail a strength saving throw
The target takes half damage, and moving costs twice as much movement for one round.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> The object or creature must be Large or smaller.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> The object or creature must be Huge or smaller.

The Void whispers to you alerting to you or an ally to new threats granting a +[1] bonus to their Initiative <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>. You are also the granted the ability to see in other forms of light ignoring darkness
+[1] added to Initiative <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag>. You are also the granted the ability to see in other forms of light ignoring darkness.
Upon focusing you can hear voices in the darkness beckoning you, guiding you, to where? you do not know, only that they sometimes help with problems presented.
You're listening to the voices you gain 1d10 to all ability checks.
Using your immense aura project power in a target area slowing anyone caught by the pressure.
Unleash intense pressure in a cone that possibly pushes or pulls creatures and objects up to [1].
Targets still take half damage and aren't pulled or pushed.
Deals an additional [1] and increases distance pulled or pushed by [2] per level.
Unleash intense pressure in a cone that possibly pushes creatures and objects up to [1].
Unleash intense pressure in a cone that possibly pulls creatures and objects up to [1].
Targets still take half damage and aren't pulled.
Convert emptiness plasma into an excessive amount of imaginary mass that pulls the very weave out of the air sending targets hurtling toward it.
Vanished to another point in time.
Targets still take half damage and aren't slowed.
Pull the concept of infinity to the surface. creatures become slowed when trying to approach you, making it seemingly impossible to reach you.
you have a barrier active that will make creature have a hard time reaching you.causes disadvantage one melee and physical range weapons made against you.

Grasp the weave within the air then pluck the thin lines of dimension connecting reality like sinew, causing a cascading explosive warping effect."Every living being is an engine geared to the Wheelwork of the universe. Though Seemingly affected by its immediate surrounding, the sphere of exturnal influance extends to an inifnite distance. come taste infinity with me."
Creature has encountered your barrier and have slowed down to a crawl
Targets movement speed has been slowed

Focus and extreme feeling of Excitement and emptiness into your blade causing it to radiate power. Deals extra force damage, along with allowing you to use your wisdom stat for attacks and has jumping corroding Force damage on critical hits.

Forcing your rage onto your weapon causes a crack of energy that begins to spill out unlight increasing the kinetic power of the weapon.Causes Dazed, Crippled, Chest Trauma, on a crit. Voidcharged:Flooding also allows your attacks to use Wsidom as their primary stat.
Wrapping your blade in Devouring Darkness has caused it to flicker in and out of existence granting it the ability to pass through armor.Also allows you yo use wisdom as your attack stat.
Send a wave of emptiness toward your target causing them to bleed.Generates Loss Remnants
Using precision strike a target causing their defense to weaken.
Grasp a target and unleash a flurry of emptiness pulses.
Channel all of your suffering and loss into your blade then unleash it in a single sweep in front of you.
Channel all of your suffering and loss into your blade then unleash it in a single sweep around you.

Open a gate into your Personal Domain that slashes at other creatures for up to 1 minute. For the duration, whenever an enemy starts its turn within your domain expansion they struggle to fight back taking a penalty to their attack.
your gate is open and wrecking havoc on all
Whenever an affected creature starts its turn within the aura, it takes [1] on a failed save and its Attack is reduced. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage.

When <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">attacking</LSTag>, every <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GAPING_WOUND">Gaping wound</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CORRODED">Corroded</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazed</LSTag> status on your target will reduce the number you need to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> by 1. This effect can stack.
Things left in the dark begins to take damage from an unseen force."Don't you hear them?! The angels they call to me!" "Cresant dont be a fool, whispers in the dark are by no means angels."
Something stalks this being damaging it at the start of each turn.

Stare into vile ancient darkness calling out to something very old and very malicious. Causes a large cloud of darkness not requiring concentration creatures within said darkness take Psychic damage each turn with a chance of cold damage."Come little children, come away with me, come to a fantasy filled with misery. I wont hurt you, not one bit, I'll let mother darkness see you're fit"
This being is being oppressed by the darkness and will take Psychic damage each turn with a chance of cold damage.

Your very presence is corrupting and will tear open your target's wounds. If your target has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GAPING_WOUND">Gaping wound</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> status, your attack extra [1]. If has <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CORRODED_1">Tainted</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Dazed</LSTag> status, deal further [1]. If has all five status, deal further [1].
Generate a small amount of Void unlight to heal your self or burn undead
Use unlight to burn away vile poisons, disease, even restore sight, or mend paralysis. Causes 1D8 Fire damage.
Using the Void's caustic nature. Form energy around the target then violently pull the power back to your own body to create a protective barrior around you
Covered in a barrier of pure energy
Sacrifice the barrier obtained from Essence Rip threading it into your allies Fates giving them a barrier
Rip a hole in the Dimension to cause the Void's unlight to flood the area wherever you stand
You become healed from the mass amount of energy flowing through you
This target has begun to disintegrate from the power trying to break free
Touch the chest or your target causing a chain reaction of the essence within them burning into unlight.
This creature is burning from the inside out so hot it burns creatures around them.
This creature takes radiant and fire damage each turn for being to close to the enervated target.
Take a deep breath and pause for a moment imagining serenity within your mind, you hear drops of water and feel a pitter patter on your shoulders before manifesting a miraculous deluge into reality.
Feeling the rain of serenity you now feel more focused then every before gaining advantage on attack rolls.

Burrow into multiple Creature's minds near by and plant false memories into their minds forcing them to hesitate from attacking you."I swear i just saw her over there...standing and starring....RIGHT THERE! Do you see her?! she is watching always watching...."
Call upon the great indifference to whisper sweet nothings into the targets mind slowly changing their perception of the world
This creature has become corrupted and has succumb to the Void's influence until struck
Rip a hole in the sky an rain darkness down on all
Command the sky with forbidden language open and rain Unlight on all
Exhume such destructive emotions that the world begins to shake and a Chaos vortex appears in the sky
This creature has the scent of Void-taint all over them each turn they are Tainted their condition will get more severe starting with an attack penalty.
Due to the spread of corruption this creature has severe burns making hard for them to concentrate.
The corruption is deep within this creature burns drip from this creatures wounds eroding their armor.
The Void now shines through cracks on the creature, at any moment it feel like it could burst already lost to its madness.
Slip into the Void to end up somewhere else."No one knows what the word meant, but they sure did know what it did"
You have mastered the art of weaving void energy into elemental affording you the power to cause dimensional strain resulting in a pulse of semi shaped energy.Generates Loss Remnants
Condense a small flash of Void Unlight into your hand then let it escape through the shape of a triangular hand sign stuning,blinding and corroding the target.
Focus raw emptiness into a crystalline state then project into a blade at your opponent causing it to erupted into spikes across their body.
Summon the elusive Hamdini master of escaping all manner of prisons
Clamp onto your target spreading your unatural corruption.
Summon the mighty Hammuri from an alternate dimension ready to destroy all in his path. "my sword is sharp and my hamster hungry".
The Space Hamster has mastered the technique maximizing its healing effect.
Due to the Flickering existence of A Space Hamster They are able to alter the Fate of others
The giant space hamster struggles with this spell, but pulls if off none the less
Pull a sword of imaginary substance from your chest that acts like a ghost blade.(only works in honour mode currently)
The Voidshard's blade passes through the target causing significant mental strain.
Summon three Astral Gerbils, one that infects,one that corrodes, and one that bleeds their targets.
